hooks.command: echo '⚡ Ontology LSP Server Suite starting in background...' && ($CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/.claude/hooks/session-start.sh > /tmp/ontology-startup.log 2>&1 &) && ($CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/.claude/hooks/startup-status.sh &)
hooks.comment: Start servers in background and show delayed status

hooks.command: echo '⚡ Checking Ontology LSP Server Suite...' && ($CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/.claude/hooks/session-start.sh > /tmp/ontology-resume.log 2>&1 &)
hooks.comment: Check and start servers in background

hooks.command: echo '⚡ Restarting Ontology LSP Server Suite...' && ($CLAUDE_PROJECT_DIR/.claude/hooks/session-start.sh > /tmp/ontology-clear.log 2>&1 &)
